wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-Colonel Richard Geoffrey Gordon Byron, 12th Baron Byron DSO (3 November 1899 – 15 June 1989) was a British nobleman, peer, politician, and army officer. He was a descendant of a cousin of Romantic poet and writer, George Gordon Byron, 6th Baron Byron.

response: * Lt.Col. Richard Byron, 12th Baron Byron DSO, 20th-century British army officer and peer
